name: ProjectReunion
description:
Welcome to multiplatform (PC and Android) pixel 2d mmorpg - Project Reunion!

discord: https://discord.gg/WaVVQfGS

The game is at a very early stage of development. I am currently working on the foundations.

I fully accept criticism and suggestions as well as ideas for far-reaching development.

Join my open Alpha release, provide suggestions and feedback, and help guide our game development to an official full release!

if you want to become an android tester, please send me your e-mail (on discord) address that you use on your phone.

(https://play.google.com/apps/internaltest/4699277732714316275)
